"@Number1pegasus":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54e96a396368725213435b00#post_54e96a396368725213435b00
But my situation is rather... complicated.

I'll have to see a friend tomorrow at 2:30pm, but my current sleep schedule is from ~10am to 8pm, so at this rate he'll arrive in the middle of "the night" for me. It's currently 7:30am here. Man, life with a sleep disorder is _so much fun._

Fuck it, i'll stay awake through the day and go to sleep in the evening. I have caffeine, i can do it!
